pr_title: Update peg-in instructions parser according to changes in the protocol

timeline.message: Peg-in protocol version uses 1 byte instead of 2

Add prefix verification to peg-in instrcutions parser.

Peg-in instructions parser now verifies that a prefix is included in the payload indicating the OP_RETURN output is for RSK. Updated tests to create transaction objects for each case instead of using raw txs.
